content.query:
--------------------------------------------------------
---CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE FOR DPOOL--------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE parquet_table_dpool
(
     Dealer_ID  VARCHAR(4000),
    Model_ID   VARCHAR(4000),
    Branch_ID  VARCHAR(4000),
    Date_ID    VARCHAR(4000),
    Units_Sold BIGINT,
    Revenue    BIGINT
)
WITH
(
   LOCATION = '/cetas_revenue',
   DATA_SOURCE = raw_external_source_dp_abfss1,
   FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format_dpool
)

--------------------------------------------------------
---CTAS(POLYBASE)--------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------

CREATE TABLE poly_table_dpool
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
)
AS
SELECT * FROM parquet_table_dpool

SELECT * FROM poly_table_dpool
